title: Valentine’s Special: Love gone bad
itunes:title: Valentine’s Special: Love gone bad
description:
When Cupid’s arrow misses the mark, a loveless spouse might seek a hit man with deadlier ammo. Nancy Grace and Alan Duke explore the cases against Jeff Lytle and Dalia Dippolito, who are each accused of plotting to kill their spouses. But thanks to the alleged incompetence of these unhappy lovers, no one dies in this episode. Happy Valentine’s Day!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
